Description: Color refers to the standard set of colors defined by Flipkart, with which you need to map the Brand Color for website refiner.
Detail Placement refers to the print or design placed on particular place of the garment.
Ideal For refers to which gender the product would be most suitable for.
Inner Material refers to the substance used to make the insides of the product.
Sample values: genuine leather||soft padding||comfort form||cotton linning||mesh||cotton lining||crepe cotton||synthetic||rexin||napa pu||faux leather||comfort foam||suede||foaming||leather||airmix||cushion||synthetic linning||fabric||solid rubber||pvc||rubber||tpc||eva footbed||millar||non-leather||soft synthetic foam||pu foam||synthetic foam||10||canvas||tpr||croslite||febric||resin||synthetic lining||denim||leather lining||textile||soft lining||memory foam||velvet||padded||from||eva||foam||syntheic leather||synthic||padded footbed||synthetic leather||lenin||cotton||pu||artificial leather||airmax||solid||comfort fabric||resin, febric||cloth||comfort insole||soft synthetic||nappa leather||synthetic fabric||soft fabric

Description: Leather Type refers to the type of leather used in the making of the product. This is not applicable for non-leather products.
Occasion refers to the type of event that the product is ideally designed to be used for. Note, 'Casual' can be selected as an occasion when the product is designed for daily wear.
Ornamentation Type refers to the decorative elements added to the product to enhance its appearance and make it more attractive
Sample values: jewels||gold details||stitch details||ghungru||fringes||none||applique||metal embellishment||stone||mesh||brand logo||fur||sequins||braids||bows||buckle||colorblock||crosstraps||embroidery||backstrap||mirror work||metal details||ghungroo||tassles||twill tape||ruffles||floral design||patchwork||ruffle||pom poms||stones||beads||smileys||thread work||eyelets||lace||tassel||tassels||knots||laser cut||hardware details||ankle strap||stitching details||statement logo||pearls||buttons||blings||sequined||gathers||ribbon||zipper details||patch work||button||pearl||toe straps

Description: Outer Material refers to the substance used to make the outsides of a particular product. For footwear products it would pertain to the material on top of the footwear or the straps. Sole material should not be mentioned here.
Sample values: genuine leather||mesh||synthetic||fur||nubuck leather||suede||leather||jute||fabric||pvc||rubber||polyester||nylon||cordovan leather||lycra||canvas||croslite||satin||resin||denim||textile||velvet||eva||synthetic leather||pu||artificial leather||tpu||patent leather||plastic||nappa leather

Description: Pattern Placement refers to the print or design placed on particular place on the product.
Heel Pattern refers to the pattern available on the heel of the product.

Description: Size refers to the size of the product represented in a numeric format. The value can be given in either a UK/India, US or Euro sizing standard. For kids product please fill the size as Euro details.
Sole Material refers to the substance used to make the sole of the product.

Description: Strap Material refers to the substance used to make the strap of the product. Possible values are Nylon, Rubber, etc.
Tip Shape refers to the shape of the product's tip.
